title: HKT x Vero Sandler collab brings sweet-looking frame protection to your ride
content:
Run out of ways to add a bit of bling to your mountain bike? Exhausted all the avenues for CNC-machined anodised aluminium componentry? If you’re still looking to add a bit of rad to your ride, you might want to consider the outcome of the HKT x Vero Sandler collaboration. HKT Products have added a […]

The post HKT x Vero Sandler collab brings sweet-looking frame protection to your ride appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
